value.title: Power BI Admins Gain My Workspace Access
value.excerpt: During this video, we will check how Power BI Admins can get User's My Workspace Access. Power BI provides secure storage for user data in their "My Workspaces". value.title: Power BI Goals - Create Scorecard and Manual Goals in Power BI
